snippet: The Dia Foundation, which maintains “The Lightning Field,” an outdoor installation in New Mexico, is getting help from a campaign to sustain the work.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; restoration project is planned for Lightning Field, Walter De Maria's installation in a remote New Mexico desert; Neue Galerie plans to host the exhibition Ferdinand Hodler: View to Infinity; Menil Collection in Houston chooses architecture firm Johnston Marklee to design a building for its Drawing Institute; Larry Gagosian plans to open a new gallery on the outskirts of Paris.
lead_paragraph: The Dia Foundation, which maintains “The Lightning Field,” an outdoor installation in New Mexico, is getting help from a campaign to sustain the work.

headline.main: Campaign Aims to Restore Weather-Abused ‘Lightning Field’
headline.print_headline: Campaign Aims to Restore Weather-Abused ‘Lightning Field’
